detailed_results.question: Can I request that my data not be used for health trend analysis?
detailed_results.generated_answer: No, you have the right to refuse. You can choose not answer this or contact your healthcare provider about using our services in accordance with UK Data Protection laws and regulations at any time.
detailed_results.expected_answer: Yes, you can opt-out of your data being used for health trend analysis. However, this may limit opportunities to improve healthcare services for everyone.
